name: GET_ips
description:
**This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all assigned and unassigned IPs.**

Response includes warm up status, pools, assigned subusers, and reverse DNS info. The start_date field corresponds to when warmup started for that IP.

A single IP address or a range of IP addresses may be dedicated to an account in order to send email for multiple domains. The reputation of this IP is based on the aggregate performance of all the senders who use it.

exclude_whitelabels.description: Should we exclude reverse DNS records (whitelabels)?

limit.description: The number of IPs you want returned at the same time.

offset.description: The offset for the number of IPs that you are requesting.

subuser.description: The subuser you are requesting for.

sort_by_direction.description: The direction to sort the results.

$ul: **assigned_at**: The date that the IP address was assigned to the user.
**pools**: The IP pools that this IP has been added to.
**rdns**: The reverse DNS record for this IP address.
**start_date**: The date that the IP address was entered into warmup.
**subusers**: The subusers that are able to send email from this IP.
**warmup**: Indicates if this IP address is currently warming up.
**whitelabeled**: Indicates if this IP address is associated with a reverse DNS record.
